articles.author: Jude Webber, Owen Walker
articles.title: Citigroup nears €100m deal for new European headquarters in Dublin - The Irish Times
articles.description: US bank hiring 300 additional staff in Ireland and eying large site in docklands co-owned by Ronan Group
articles.content: Citigroup is close to signing a 100 million deal to buy a new office site in the heart of Dublin in a significant boost to the scale of its European headquarters as banks beef up their presence acros… [+3889 chars]
